page.title: 02SEMILONG
page.content: THE AREA IS DIVIDED INTO TWO DISTINCT AREAS, HOUSES ARE MAINLY TERRACED. MOST OF THE HOUSES ARE 100-150 YEARS OLD. IT IS A CROWDED AREA WITH THE HOUSES DENSELY PACKED. ALOT OF THE HOUSES ARE DETERIORATING. MANY PEOPLE HAD CATS OR DOGS AS PETS. THERE WERE MANY FACTORIES AND WORKSHOPS IN THE AREA.THERE WAS ALSO AN AREA OF MODERN THREE STOREY FLATS. NEAR THE NEW G.P.O. SORTING OFFICE ONE LARGE WALL WAS COVERED IN GRAFFITI. IT WAS FAIRLY BUSY, ESPECIALLY IN THE AREA BOUNDED BY CAMPBELL STREET, BARRACK ROAD,AND CLARE STREET.THE AREA IS L SERVED BY SMALL LOCAL SHOPS OF EVERY DESCRIPTION.
